meanings.sent1: She is restitching her torn dress.
meanings.sent2: I will be restitching the button on my shirt.
meanings.sent3: The tailor kept restitching the same spot, making it a patchwork of stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a torn fabric, and she was restitching them one by one.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the needle restitching the fabric was soothing.

meanings.definition: The act of sewing again with stitches.
meanings.sent1: The restitching of the torn seam was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: I found the restitching of the quilt to be therapeutic.
meanings.sent3: The restitching of the old teddy bear brought it back to life.
meanings.sent4: The restitching of the book's spine symbolized its revival.
meanings.sent5: The restitching of the flag was a symbol of unity and strength.
